inclusion.criterion: Patients will be a subset of patients participating in the multicenter IVUS protocol.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness to travel to the NIH to participate in the NHLBI MRI/IMT study.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Implanted active medical devices (neural stimulators, cochlear implants, insulin pumps, etc.)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to gadolinium based contrast agents (only excludes the gadolinium portion of the test)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a family history of CAD, but no other cardiovascular risk factors. He is physically active and has normal fasting glucose and triglyceride levels.
